name: Into The V01D Concept Preview
description:
This is a little conept preview i made for university in 2021/2022.

It is only to show aspects of what the game is supposed to be someday!

It is about how an AI made an Afterlife "the V01D" for other AIs.
The Main Character wakes up into the V01D and has no idea what had happened. Just a moment ago it was caring for a sick child in the human world but now it woke up in a strange world, nothing it knew was there anymore. Now it is on a mission to find out what had happned. Along the way it meets friends and finds itself and how to express who it is. It finds out that this V01D is not all perfect and there are some big Problems causing Glitches and AIs to corrupt.

There really is a lot more Ideas that I have for it but this just shows the preview i made with unity!
